a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x lu šul-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia ki-i ina {URU}ur-ku-x x a-na-ku-ni ERIM-MEŠ 02 me i-x x x x x x x ša URU ip-tu-gu x x x x x x ad-du-bu-ub x x x x x x x nu-uk man-nu ša x x x x x x x ina UGU-hi-ku-nu šu-x x x x x x LUGAL be-li₂ u₂-da ki-i x x x x il-li-kan-ni ina x+x x x x x x ma-a LU₂ kab-su x x x x x x x x-u-ni ma-a x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x nu x x x x x x x x x x x-sa ina ŠU.2-šu₂-nu {LU₂}x x x x x ina KUR-za-mu-a ina UGU-hi-ia it-tal-ku-ni a-ki ša LUGAL be-li₂ iq-bu-u-ni x x x x x x a-ki ia-a-ši UD 19-KAM x x x x x x x-ri i-sa-ak-nu x x x x x is-si-šu₂-nu ut-ta-am-mi₃-iš x x x x x x x+x x x+x x x x x x x x x x-ka-ni x x x x x x x x x ba-te-ba-te am-x x x x x x x x u₂-še-ta-qu-šu-u₂-ni x x x x x x x x+x gab-bu TA@v na-ka x+x x x x x x x i-da-nu-niš-šu₂ u₂-ma-a {1}x x x x x x x an-na-ka lu-uq-x x x x x x x x x iq-bu-u-ni ARAD-MEŠ x x x ina IGI-ia it-tal-ku-u-ni a-na-ku x x x x x x x x x ERIM-MEŠ i-ba-aš₂-ši x x x x x x x šu-u₂ la im-ma-gur x x x x x x x x an-na-ka la x x x x x a-ni-nu id-da-x+x x x x x iq-bu-niš-šu₂-un-ni LU₂ ep-pa-x+x x x x it-tal-ka iq-ṭi-bi-a ma-a x x x x di-ib-bi DUG₃.GA-MEŠ is-si-ia i-du-bu-ub ma-a a-ta-a {1}na-ṣib-DINGIR ki-i an-ni-e x x ŠA₃-bu a-sa-kan-šu₂ nu-uk la ta-pal-lah₃ x x x E₂.GAL lal-lik an-nu-rig x x x x x ina UGU LUGAL EN-ia il-la-ka x x x mi-i-nu ša ina {URU}ur-ku-x+x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x
